spatial_accuracy.notes: Living Room and Bedroom 1 wall geometry significantly altered. Toilet and Wash Area combined into one space and their relationship to Bedroom 1 and the stairs is dramatically different in the 3D model. Back door from Kitchen to 'Entrance to the House' is missing. Windows in living room are present but are rendered as openings rather than windows. Dining room extension wall is curved in the 2D plan but straight in 3D. Staircase direction is reversed.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the entire 'Entrance to the House' space. Floor material is textured, violating 'solid flat colors only' rule. Rendered background is not dark neutral, it's a solid dark color. Shadows extend far indicating a ground plane beyond the visible model.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture pieces (beds, sofas, tables) are present. Kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures are present. However, the 'Wash Area' and 'Toilet' are combined and significantly reconfigured in the 3D, changing the furniture layout. The toilet is also in a different orientation than implied by the 2D plan. Sofa layout in the living room is not 100% accurate, an additional armchair seems to be added.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Geometry is low-poly. However, the floor and some kitchen elements show textures, not just solid flat colors. Lighting suggests some advanced rendering with soft shadows, not just flat shading. Background is a solid color and not a gradient. The floor appears to have a slight reflective quality. Camera composition is good, it is isometric and well-framed.

detected_errors.description: The 'Entrance to the House' area is entirely missing in the 3D render.
Combination and major reconfiguration of 'Wash Area' and 'Toilet' into a single bathroom space, significantly altering their geometry and adjacency to other rooms and stairs.
Missing a door from the Kitchen to the 'Entrance to the House'.
Curved wall of dining room is rendered as straight in the 3D model.
Floor and some kitchen elements display textures, not flat colors.
Rendered background is a solid color, not a gradient as specified.
Shadows extend to infinity, indicating an active ground plane.
Staircase direction is reversed in the 3D model (going up from the right instead of left).
Sofa layout in living room has an additional armchair not present in the 2D plan's furniture.

summary: The 3D render fails due to several critical and major discrepancies in spatial accuracy and structural fidelity, notably the missing 'Entrance to the House' and wholesale reconfiguration of bathroom areas. Textures and lighting also deviate from the strict aesthetic guidelines.
